cgcloud__Workflow_State_Transition__c.name: cgcloud__Workflow_State_Transition__c
cgcloud__Workflow_State_Transition__c.description: Stores the details of the workflow state transition.

cgcloud__Event__c.description: Event that triggers the state transition. For example, Save or Delete.

cgcloud__From_Status__c.description: Reference to the state that's valid before the state transition.

cgcloud__To_Status__c.description: Reference to the state that's valid after the state transition.
